      • solve

        public boolean solve​(Cell[][] grid,
                     int row,
                     int column)
        Backtracking algorithm for kakuro solving
        Parameters:
        grid - current grid distribution
        row - current row
        column - current column
        Returns:
        true the solution has been found and saved into this.solution / false if there is no solution

        checks if the value on the current position was misplaced
        Parameters:

        column - current horizontal position
        Returns:
        a boolean that check if the number given is misplaced or not
